name: Crown Delights Deli: 3.0 Prototype
description:
Welcome to Crown Delights Deli!

Summary You're Jules, you just turned 15 two weeks ago, and you've been chilling around the house for your summer vacation so far. Your madre isn't too happy about that and has finally convinced you to try and find a small job for the rest of the summer.

You come across Javi's small corner bodega that goes by the name of Crown Delights Deli. Javi agrees to let you start working there, but believes in learning on the job. You're immediately greeted with new faces and personalities and you must do your best to say the right thing.

Controls Left-Click  -  select dialogue choice

Team Isiah Rosa - Game Design, Writer

Mike Zhang -  Programmer

Lianna Pang -  Production, Writer

Isaac Wirth  -  Graphic design, UI/UX

Kyra Zimmermann -  Illustrator
